verses.verse: These are the sons <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; Re'uven <WH7205>, SHim`on <WH8095>, Levi <WH3878>, and Y'hudah <WH3063>, Yissakhar <WH3485>, and Z'vulun <WH2074>,
Dan <WH1835>, Yosef <WH3130>, and Binyamin <WH1144>, Naftali <WH5321>, Gad <WH1410>, and Asher <WH836>.

The sons <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063>; Er <WH6147>, and Onan <WH209>, and Shelah <WH7956>: which three <WH7969> were born <WH3205> <WH8738> unto him of the daughter <WH1323> of Shua <WH7774> <WH8677> <WH1340> the Kanahanitess <WH3669>. And Er <WH6147>, the firstborn <WH1060> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>; and he slew <WH4191> <WH8686> him.
And Tamar <WH8559> his daughter in Torah <WH3618> bare <WH3205> <WH8804> him Pharez <WH6557> and Zerah <WH2226>. All the sons <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> were five <WH2568>.
The sons <WH1121> of Pharez <WH6557>; Hezron <WH2696>, and Hamul <WH2538>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226>; Zimri <WH2174>, and Ethan <WH387>, and Heman <WH1968>, and Calcol <WH3633>, and Dara <WH1873>: five <WH2568> of them in all.
And the sons <WH1121> of Karmi <WH3756>; Achar <WH5917>, the troubler <WH5916> <WH8802> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, who transgressed <WH4603> <WH8804> in the thing accursed <WH2764>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Ethan <WH387>; Azariah <WH5838>.
The sons <WH1121> also of Hezron <WH2696>, that were born <WH3205> <WH8738> unto him; Jerahmeel <WH3396>, and Ram <WH7410>, and Chelubai <WH3621>.
And Ram <WH7410> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Amminadab <WH5992>; and Amminadab <WH5992> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Nachshon <WH5177>, prince <WH5387> of the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063>;
And Nachshon <WH5177> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Salma <WH8007>, and Salma <WH8007> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Boaz <WH1162>,
And Boaz <WH1162> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> `Oved <WH5744>, and `Oved <WH5744> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Yishai <WH3448>,
And Yishai <WH3448> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> his firstborn <WH1060> Eliab <WH446>, and Abinadab <WH41> the second <WH8145>, and Shimma <WH8092> the third <WH7992>,
Nethaneel <WH5417> the fourth <WH7243>, Raddai <WH7288> the fifth <WH2549>,
Ozem <WH684> the sixth <WH8345>, David <WH1732> the seventh <WH7637>:
Whose sisters <WH269> were TZ'ruyah <WH6870>, and Avigayil <WH26>. And the sons <WH1121> of TZ'ruyah <WH6870>; Abishai <WH52>, and Yo'av <WH3097>, and Asahel <WH6214>, three <WH7969>.
And Avigayil <WH26> bare <WH3205> <WH8804> Amasa <WH6021>: and the father <WH1> of Amasa <WH6021> was Jether <WH3500> the Ishmeelite <WH3459>.

And Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Hezron <WH2696> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> children of <WH854> Azubah <WH5806> his wife <WH802>, and of Jerioth <WH3408>: her sons <WH1121> are these; Jesher <WH3475>, and Shobab <WH7727>, and Ardon <WH715>.
And when Azubah <WH5806> was dead <WH4191> <WH8799>, Kalev <WH3612> took <WH3947> <WH8799> unto him Ephrath <WH672>, which bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Hur <WH2354>.
And Hur <WH2354> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Uri <WH221>, and Uri <WH221> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Bezaleel <WH1212>.

And afterward <WH310> Hezron <WH2696> went in <WH935> <WH8804> to the daughter <WH1323> of Machir <WH4353> the father <WH1> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, whom he married <WH3947> <WH8804> when he was threescore <WH8346> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>; and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Segub <WH7687>.
And Segub <WH7687> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Jair <WH2971>, who had three <WH7969> and twenty <WH6242> cities <WH5892> in the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> Geshur <WH1650>, and Aram <WH758>, with the towns <WH2333> of Jair <WH2971>, from them, with Kenath <WH7079>, and the towns <WH1323> thereof, even threescore <WH8346> cities <WH5892>. All these belonged to the sons <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the father <WH1> of Gil`ad <WH1568>.

And after <WH310> that Hezron <WH2696> was dead <WH4194> in Kalevephratah <WH3613>, then Abiah <WH29> Hezron's <WH2696> wife <WH802> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Ashur <WH806> the father <WH1> of Tekoa <WH8620>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Jerahmeel <WH3396> the firstborn <WH1060> of Hezron <WH2696> were, Ram <WH7410> the firstborn <WH1060>, and Bunah <WH946>, and Oren <WH767>, and Ozem <WH684>, and AhiYAH <WH281>.
Jerahmeel <WH3396> had also another <WH312> wife <WH802>, whose name <WH8034> was Atarah <WH5851>; she was the mother <WH517> of Onam <WH208>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Ram <WH7410> the firstborn <WH1060> of Jerahmeel <WH3396> were, Maaz <WH4619>, and Jamin <WH3226>, and Eker <WH6134>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Onam <WH208> were, Shammai <WH8060>, and Jada <WH3047>. And the sons <WH1121> of Shammai <WH8060>; Nadav <WH5070>, and Abishur <WH51>.
And the name <WH8034> of the wife <WH802> of Abishur <WH51> was Abihail <WH32>, and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Ahban <WH257>, and Molid <WH4140>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Nadav <WH5070>; Seled <WH5540>, and Appaim <WH649>: but Seled <WH5540> died <WH4191> <WH8799> without children <WH1121>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Appaim <WH649>; Ishi <WH3469>. And the sons <WH1121> of Ishi <WH3469>; Sheshan <WH8348>. And the children <WH1121> of Sheshan <WH8348>; Ahlai <WH304>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Jada <WH3047> the brother <WH251> of Shammai <WH8060>; Jether <WH3500>, and Y'honatan <WH3129>: and Jether <WH3500> died <WH4191> <WH8799> without children <WH1121>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Y'honatan <WH3129>; Peleth <WH6431>, and Zaza <WH2117>. These were the sons <WH1121> of Jerahmeel <WH3396>.
Now Sheshan <WH8348> had no sons <WH1121>, but daughters <WH1323>. And Sheshan <WH8348> had a servant <WH5650>, an Egyptian <WH4713>, whose name <WH8034> was Jarha <WH3398>.
And Sheshan <WH8348> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> his daughter <WH1323> to Jarha <WH3398> his servant <WH5650> to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Attai <WH6262>.
And Attai <WH6262> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Natan <WH5416>, and Natan <WH5416> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Zabad <WH2066>,
And Zabad <WH2066> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Ephlal <WH654>, and Ephlal <WH654> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> `Oved <WH5744>,
And `Oved <WH5744> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Yehu <WH3058>, and Yehu <WH3058> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Azariah <WH5838>,
And Azariah <WH5838> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Helez <WH2503>, and Helez <WH2503> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Eleasah <WH501>,
And Eleasah <WH501> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Sisamai <WH5581>, and Sisamai <WH5581> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Shallum <WH7967>,
And Shallum <WH7967> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Jekamiah <WH3359>, and Jekamiah <WH3359> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Elishama <WH476>.

Now the sons <WH1121> of Kalev <WH3612> the brother <WH251> of Jerahmeel <WH3396> were, Mesha <WH4337> his firstborn <WH1060>, which was the father <WH1> of Ziph <WH2128>; and the sons <WH1121> of Mareshah <WH4762> the father <WH1> of Hevron <WH2275>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Hevron <WH2275>; Korach <WH7141>, and Tappuah <WH8599>, and Rekem <WH7552>, and Shema <WH8087>.
And Shema <WH8087> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Raham <WH7357>, the father <WH1> of Jorkoam <WH3421>: and Rekem <WH7552> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Shammai <WH8060>.
And the son <WH1121> of Shammai <WH8060> was Maon <WH4584>: and Maon <WH4584> was the father <WH1> of Bethzur <WH1049>.
And Ephah <WH5891>, Kalev's <WH3612> concubine <WH6370>, bare <WH3205> <WH8804> Haran <WH2771>, and Moza <WH4162>, and Gazez <WH1495>: and Haran <WH2771> begat <WH3205> <WH8689> Gazez <WH1495>.
And the sons <WH1121> of YAHdai <WH3056>; Regem <WH7276>, and Yotam <WH3147>, and Geshan <WH1529>, and Pelet <WH6404>, and Ephah <WH5891>, and Shaaph <WH8174>.
Maachah <WH4601>, Kalev's <WH3612> concubine <WH6370>, bare <WH3205> <WH8804> Sheber <WH7669>, and Tirhanah <WH8647>.

She bare <WH3205> <WH8799> also Shaaph <WH8174> the father <WH1> of Madmannah <WH4089>, Sheva <WH7724> the father <WH1> of Machbenah <WH4343>, and the father <WH1> of Gibea <WH1388>: and the daughter <WH1323> of Kalev <WH3612> was Achsah <WH5915>.
These were the sons <WH1121> of Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Hur <WH2354>, the firstborn <WH1060> of Ephratah <WH672>; Shobal <WH7732> the father <WH1> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157>,
Salma <WH8007> the father <WH1> of Beit-Lechem <WH1035>, Hareph <WH2780> the father <WH1> of Bethgader <WH1013>.
And Shobal <WH7732> the father <WH1> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157> had sons <WH1121>; Haroeh <WH7204>, and half <WH2677> of the Manahethites <WH2679>.

And the families <WH4940> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <WH7157>; the Ithrites <WH3505>, and the Puhites <WH6336>, and the Shumathites <WH8126>, and the Mishraites <WH4954>; of them came <WH3318> <WH8804> the Zareathites <WH6882>, and the Eshtaulites <WH848>.

The sons <WH1121> of Salma <WH8007>; Beit-Lechem <WH1035>, and the Netophathites <WH5200>, Ataroth <WH5852>, the house of Yo'av <WH5854>, and half <WH2677> of the Manahethites <WH2680>, the Zorites <WH6882>.

And the families <WH4940> of the scribes <WH5608> <WH8802> which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> <WH8675> <WH3427> <WH8804> at Jabez <WH3258>; the Tirathites <WH8654>, the Shimeathites <WH8101>, and Suchathites <WH7756>. These <WH1992> are the Kenites <WH7017> that came <WH935> <WH8802> of Hemath <WH2574>, the father <WH1> of the house <WH1004> of Rechab <WH7394>.
